Class.ClassComment: AlgebraicInitial /** * This annotation is to be used on a Groovy method which is part of an Algebraic UDF to indicate that it will act as the exec method of the 'Initial' class of the UDF. The value of the annotation is the name of the Algebraic UDF it belongs to. The annotated method MUST accept a single groovy.lang.Tuple parameter, and MUST return a groovy.lang.Tuple or Object[]. */
